pros: Co workers are amazing, compensation is good, always feel like we are making an amazing impact in the community

review_title: HRRV is great place to work!
pros: Great staff; great mission--make a great difference in the lives of our patients and their loved ones; flexibility in schedules; and true patient-centered-care model.
cons: Sometimes there are competing priorities, but in the end, we all work for the patient

So many...
Understaffed, salaried all the RNs and work then to death. Caseloads are crazy high with some having up to 30+ patients. Leadership/management have no concern for the nurses, they are irrelevant. The CEO only cares about growth and because of this the quality of care for patients and families is greatly compromised.

job_title: RN Staff Nurse in Fargo, ND
pros: I thought hospice was a good place and I always wanted to work there but it isn't what I thought it would be
cons: Long hours, on call hours are horrible, empty promises, no appreciation from management, everyone seems unhappy and/or looking for a new job
